original_text:
Desperados Wild Megaways
Ambientata nel selvaggio West, Desperados Wild Megaways prodotta dalla Inspired Gaming è una slot che appartiene alla famiglia delle Megaways, dove le linee di pagamento non sono fisse ma variano in base al numero dei simboli che si presentano sui rulli. Dal punto di vista grafico questa slot riprende tutti i simboli del West: cowboy dalla mano calda, whiskey, dinamite per gli attacchi alle diligenze e l’immancabile distintivo dello sceriffo a garantire l’ordine della città. Lo sfondo è il Gran Canyon, su cui si staglia la griglia dalla cornice di legno. Il comparto musicale ha un sapore epico, che si ispira a quello dei grandi Western che in passato hanno fatto la fortuna del Cinema.
I tasti “Start”, “Impostazioni”, “Valore Scommessa” e “Acquisto Bonus” svaniscono durante la rotazione dei rulli e riappiano una volta concluso lo Spin.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha 6 rulli, mentre il numero delle linee dipende dalle dimensioni dei simboli: quelli più piccoli occupano 6 slot, quelli più grandi soltanto 2. Nella parte alta della cornice e in corrispondenza dei rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 c’è una linea aggiuntiva. Come detto in precedenza i modi per vincere sono ben 117.649, con RTP pari al 95,21% e una volatilità media. La puntata va da un minimo di 0,20 a un massimo di 20 €. Tenendo premuto il tasto Start si possono attivare tra i 5 e 100 giri automatici, con la possibilità di impostare dei limiti di vincita o di perdita.
Simboli e funzionalità di Desperados Wild Megaways
Partiamo subito dicendo che ogni volta che si ha una combinazione pagante, i simboli vincenti scompaiono e vengono sostituiti. Per quel che riguarda il loro valore, come da copione le carte da gioco sono quelli che pagano meno di tutti, seguiti dalla bottiglia di whiskey, dalle pistole e dalla dinamite. Il simbolo con maggior valore è il distintivo dello sceriffo. I fuorilegge sono i 4 simboli Wild, hanno funzione di Jolly e sostituiscono tutti i simboli eccetto quello Bonus. Durante le partite normali, i simboli Wild possono apparire solo sulla linea extra. Per accedere ai livelli speciali del gioco è necessario che sui rulli appaiono 4 o più simboli Scatter, rappresentato dalla scritta Bonus. A questo punto il giocatore dovrà scegliere tra due livelli, Tramonto e Prigione. Vediamoli nel dettaglio:

Tramonto: con 4 simboli Scatter si hanno 8 giri gratuiti. Durante la partita speciale, i simboli Bonus possono apparire solo sul rullo superiore. Ognuno di esso garantisce un nuovo Free Spin, con 3 simboli invece avremo diritto a 5 giri aggiuntivi. Ogni combinazione vincente aggiunge un moltiplicatore x1.
Prigione: in questo caso scompare il rullo extra in favore di una griglia 6×6. Anche la funzionalità Cascata viene interrotta. I simboli Wild che appaiono sui rulli rimangono durante tutti i Free Spins e nel caso si riesca a riempire con essi l’intera griglia, si avrà diritto a 5 giri extra.

Il giocatore può anche decidere di acquistare i Bonus. Dopo aver scelto quale livello giocare, Tramonto o Prigione, si ha la possibilità di decidere se provare a incrementare il numero di Free Spins o di perdere l’intero Bonus.

raw_translation.response:
Desperados Wild Megaways

Set in the Wild West, Desperados Wild Megaways produced by Inspired Gaming is a slot belonging to the Megaways family, where paylines are not fixed but vary depending on the number of symbols that appear on the reels. From a graphic point of view, this slot captures all the symbols of the West: hot-handed cowboys, whiskey, dynamite for attacks on stagecoaches and the inevitable sheriff's badge to ensure order in the city. The background is the Grand Canyon, with the grid framed in wood. The musical component has an epic flavor, inspired by the great Westerns of the past that made the fortune of Cinema.

The "Start", "Settings", "Bet Value" and "Buy Bonus" buttons disappear during reel rotation and reappear once the spin is complete.

Slot features:

The game grid has 6 reels, while the number of lines depends on the size of the symbols: the smaller ones occupy 6 slots, the larger ones only 2. In the upper part of the frame and corresponding to reels 2, 3, 4, and 5, there is an additional line. As mentioned earlier, there are 117,649 ways to win, with an RTP of 95.21% and medium volatility. The bet ranges from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €20. By holding down the Start button, you can activate between 5 and 100 automatic spins, with the possibility of setting win or loss limits.

Symbols and features of Desperados Wild Megaways:

Let's start by saying that every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols disappear and are replaced. As for their value, as expected playing cards pay the least, followed by a bottle of whiskey, guns, and dynamite. The symbol with the highest value is the sheriff's badge. The outlaws are the 4 Wild symbols, they act as Jokers and replace all symbols except the Bonus one. During normal play, Wild symbols can only appear on the extra line. To access the special levels of the game, 4 or more Scatter symbols, represented by the word Bonus, must appear on the reels. At this point, the player must choose between two levels, Sunset and Prison. Let's take a closer look at them:

Sunset: with 4 Scatter symbols, you get 8 free spins. During the special game, Bonus symbols can only appear on the top reel, each one guarantees a new Free Spin, and with 3 symbols, we are entitled to 5 additional spins. Each winning combination adds a x1 multiplier.

Prison: in this case, the extra reel disappears in favor of a 6x6 grid. The Cascade feature is also interrupted. Wild symbols that appear on the reels remain throughout all Free Spins, and if you manage to fill the entire grid with them, you will be entitled to 5 extra spins.

The player can also decide to purchase the Bonus. After choosing which level to play, Sunset or Prison, you have the option to decide whether to try to increase the number of Free Spins or lose the entire Bonus.

Review: Desperados Wild Megaways - A review

Set in the wild west, Desperados Wild Megaways produced by Inspired Gaming is a slot game belonging to the Megaways family, where paylines are not fixed but vary based on the number of symbols that appear on the reels. From a visual point of view, this slot game features all the symbols of the West: hot-handed cowboys, whiskey, dynamite for attacking stagecoaches, and the inevitable sheriff's badge to ensure order in the town. The background is the Grand Canyon, on which the wooden framed grid stands out. The sound department has an epic flair, inspired by the great Westerns that have made cinema successful in the past.

The "Start," "Settings," "Bet Value," and "Bonus Purchase" buttons disappear during the rotation of the reels and reappear once the spin is completed.

Slot features
The game grid has 6 reels, while the number of lines depends on the size of the symbols: smaller ones occupy 6 slots, larger ones only 2. In the upper part of the frame and corresponding to reels 2, 3, 4, and 5, there is an additional line. As previously mentioned, there are 117,649 ways to win, with an RTP of 95.21% and medium volatility. The bet ranges from a minimum of 0.20 to a maximum of 20 €. By holding down the Start button, between 5 and 100 automatic spins can be activated, with the possibility of setting win or loss limits.

Symbols and functionalities of Desperados Wild Megaways
Let's start by saying that every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols disappear and are replaced. As far as their value is concerned, as usual, the playing cards pay the least of all, followed by the whiskey bottle, guns, and dynamite. The symbol with the highest value is the sheriff's badge. The outlaws are the 4 Wild symbols, they have a Jolly function and replace all the symbols except the Bonus one. During normal games, Wild symbols can only appear on the extra line. To access the special levels of the game, it is necessary to have 4 or more Scatter symbols on the reels, represented by the word "Bonus." At this point, the player must choose between two levels, Sunset and Prison. Let's see them in detail:

Sunset: with 4 Scatter symbols, you get 8 free spins. During the special game, Bonus symbols can only appear on the upper reel. Each of them guarantees a new Free Spin, with 3 symbols we are entitled to 5 additional spins. Each winning combination adds a multiplier x1.
Prison: in this case, the extra reel disappears in favor of a 6x6 grid. The Cascade functionality is also interrupted. The Wild symbols that appear on the reels remain during all Free Spins, and if you manage to fill the entire grid with them, you are entitled to 5 extra spins.

The player can also decide to purchase the Bonus. After choosing which level to play, Sunset or Prison, you have the possibility to decide whether to try to increase the number of Free Spins or lose the entire Bonus. 

Experience the thrill of the Wild West and try out Desperados Wild Megaways slot today!

response.headline: Special Features and Levels
response.content:
Let's talk about the real fun stuff - the special features and levels of Desperados Wild Megaways! When you're actually winning at this game, the symbols disappear and get replaced with whatever other symbols are coming your way. It's like magic, but with less rabbits and more whiskey.

The playing cards are on the lower end of values, followed by whiskey bottles, guns, and dynamite. Kind of like showing up to a gunfight with just a pack of cards - you're hoping luck is on your side. However, the shining star of this game is the sheriff's badge - the hero this slot machine deserves.

The wild outlaws in this game are like the hired guns of the reels. They can replace all the symbols except Bonus symbols, and they only appear on the extra line. And don't worry, these outlaws won't be robbing you blind...they're just here to help you get more money.

Now, if you're feeling lucky, you can access the Sunset and Prison special levels with 4 or more Bonus symbols. The Sunset level offers players 8 free spins, but the catch is that Bonus symbols only appear on the upper reel. And of course, if you do hit a winning combination, there's a sweet multiplier of x1 that gets added to your earnings (to help fund future gambling sprees, of course).

The Prison level is where things get real serious. It has a 6x6 grid with interrupted Cascade functionality. And that's a fancy way of saying that the action never stops! The wild symbols that appear during the reels will remain there for all the Free Spins, and there's even a chance to get an extra 5 spins if you happen to fill the entire grid with wild symbols. Equally important, you can purchase a Bonus and choose to try and increase the number of free spins. Or, you can lose the entire Bonus - which is kind of like getting caught by the law after a long successful robbery. It's not fun, but sometimes you just gotta roll those dice.

Review:
 
Desperados Wild Megaways - Neutral Review

Desperados Wild Megaways is a slot game set in the wild west, produced by Inspired Gaming and belonging to the Megaways family. The game features symbols such as cowboys, whiskey, dynamite, and sheriff's badges, and the background is the Grand Canyon. The sound design is inspired by Western movies.

Gameplay Details

Desperados Wild Megaways has 6 reels and 117,649 ways to win, with an RTP of 95.21% and medium volatility. The bet range is from 0.20 to 20 € and players can activate automatic spins from 5 to 100, with win or loss limits.

Special Features and Levels

When there is a winning combination, the symbols disappear and are replaced. The playing cards have the lowest value, followed by whiskey bottles, guns, and dynamite, with the sheriff's badge having the highest value. The 4 Wild symbols are the outlaws, which can replace all symbols except Bonus, and appear only on the extra line. To access the Sunset and Prison special levels, 4 or more Bonus symbols are needed. Sunset offers 8 free spins, with Bonus symbols appearing only on the upper reel, and every winning combination adds a multiplier x1. Prison has a 6x6 grid and interrupted Cascade functionality, and Wild symbols that appear on the reels remain during all Free Spins, with the possibility of 5 extra spins if the entire grid is filled with them. Players can purchase the Bonus and choose to try and increase the number of free spins or lose the entire Bonus.

Bet Range and RTP

Desperados Wild Megaways has a bet range from 0.20 to 20 € and an RTP of 95.21%, with medium volatility.

Visuals and Sound Design

Desperados Wild Megaways has symbols that fit the wild west theme and a wooden framed grid set in the Grand Canyon. The sound design is inspired by Western movies.

Review: Desperados Wild Megaways - A review

Set in the wild west, Desperados Wild Megaways produced by Inspired Gaming is a slot game belonging to the Megaways family, where paylines are not fixed but vary based on the number of symbols that appear on the reels. From a visual point of view, this slot game features all the symbols of the West: hot-handed cowboys, whiskey, dynamite for attacking stagecoaches, and the inevitable sheriff's badge to ensure order in the town. The background is the Grand Canyon, on which the wooden framed grid stands out. The sound department has an epic flair, inspired by the great Westerns that have made cinema successful in the past.

The "Start," "Settings," "Bet Value," and "Bonus Purchase" buttons disappear during the rotation of the reels and reappear once the spin is completed.

Slot features
The game grid has 6 reels, while the number of lines depends on the size of the symbols: smaller ones occupy 6 slots, larger ones only 2. In the upper part of the frame and corresponding to reels 2, 3, 4, and 5, there is an additional line. As previously mentioned, there are 117,649 ways to win, with an RTP of 95.21% and medium volatility. The bet ranges from a minimum of 0.20 to a maximum of 20 €. By holding down the Start button, between 5 and 100 automatic spins can be activated, with the possibility of setting win or loss limits.

Symbols and functionalities of Desperados Wild Megaways
Let's start by saying that every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols disappear and are replaced. As far as their value is concerned, as usual, the playing cards pay the least of all, followed by the whiskey bottle, guns, and dynamite. The symbol with the highest value is the sheriff's badge. The outlaws are the 4 Wild symbols, they have a Jolly function and replace all the symbols except the Bonus one. During normal games, Wild symbols can only appear on the extra line. To access the special levels of the game, it is necessary to have 4 or more Scatter symbols on the reels, represented by the word "Bonus." At this point, the player must choose between two levels, Sunset and Prison. Let's see them in detail:

Sunset: with 4 Scatter symbols, you get 8 free spins. During the special game, Bonus symbols can only appear on the upper reel. Each of them guarantees a new Free Spin, with 3 symbols we are entitled to 5 additional spins. Each winning combination adds a multiplier x1.
Prison: in this case, the extra reel disappears in favor of a 6x6 grid. The Cascade functionality is also interrupted. The Wild symbols that appear on the reels remain during all Free Spins, and if you manage to fill the entire grid with them, you are entitled to 5 extra spins.

The player can also decide to purchase the Bonus. After choosing which level to play, Sunset or Prison, you have the possibility to decide whether to try to increase the number of Free Spins or lose the entire Bonus. 

Experience the thrill of the Wild West and try out Desperados Wild Megaways slot today!
